# Basic RSA

#### Requirements

- [python3](https://www.python.org)
- [gmpy2](https://pypi.org/project/gmpy2/) (optional)

#### Exercise

You have the following RSA values:

```
n = 
e = 0x10001
p = 
c = 
```

Decrypt the ciphertext `c`.

#### Tips

For this exercise you need to compute the modular multiplicative inverse of some
integers which is provided by the module `gmpy2`. You get bonus points if you
implement the invert function yourself using the Extended Euclidean Algorithm.
